page.title: 20PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {PLEASE MR. CROCODILE}We sing a song to this game like this. "Please Mr. Crocodile may I cross the water, to see the queen's daughter." "Yes, only if you are wearing...." If you are wearing the colour that the 'crocodile' says you can go past him. If not, then you have to get past him without being caught, or you are 'he'. {STICK IN THE MUD}this is a game of chase where if you are caught you are stuck and can only be freed by someone else touching you. When you are caught 4 times you are then 'he'. {HOPSCOTCH} is numbered squares in the playground. One person throws a stone on number 1 and then hops on all the other numbers except 1, picking the stone on the return journey. You then throw on to the next number and so on until you miss a number and then it is someone elses turn.
